main event: A red ball of fire was observed in Tuscaloosa, Alabama on May 16, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as being 50-60 ft tall or larger,The sighting lasted for about 5-10 seconds and the object traveled north over Tuscaloosa,It was observed from the ground,Comments included that the object appeared to be a meteor,Multiple reports of a similar sighting were received by Tuscaloosa Radio.
